topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Holy carp; steamos and unity may actualy be bigger than I think it will be.

If you're wondering what I mean by this is after I got my financial aid sorted out I looked at what programs and so forth my degree will be working with.  Right off the bat they're teaching us how to use Unity game engine and later on we're going to be taught SQL (linux).  Directx and a lot of engines are straight up not being taught.  We're still getting taught C++ for obvious reasons, but still if it's to that point where certain things aren't going to be taught you know something's a big deal.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

same.

Apparently, the Chinese referred to Rome (in contact with through trade connections) as Daqin.
Meaning: the other China.

And pity the Armenians: the two most well known Armenians are Kim Kardashian and Anita Sarkeesian.

Anyway Sirens is a workplace comedy about EMTs and was written by Denis Leary.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53716e8b6368724c3af60200#post_53716e8b6368724c3af60200
I'll have to give it a shot. Now that you describe it, I remember seeing trailers for it and thinking they were pretty funny.

Hannibal is seriously a gorgeous series, they show profoundly grotesque things in some of the most gorgeous shots I've ever seen. I will say though that it should not be watched if gore gets to you easily, because it is so fucking gory that the only way to properly describe it is with the word fucking thrown in there.

topics.body:
[spoiler]Gasmaskangel and Trixie had sex on the Moon for three and a half weeks. When Randomosaur, Mary Sue and Twilight Sparkle landed beside them on a giant space-breathing pterosaur, they both decided to go with them on their quest to find the final piece of the Cumminator: A shed xenomorph skeleton.

When they landed on the xenomorph's home planet, Randomosaur, Gasmaskangel and Trixie immediately settled a treaty by having sex with the xenomorphs, producing billions of pegasus children. But just as they got enough money to buy a xenomorph exoskeleton, Jesus Christ and Mohammed suddenly appeared along with SquiggyBomb and TheLoneLampman. A battle was about to begin.[/spoiler]
